title: 674: BITCOIN TERMINAL VALUE IS REALLY $700K PER BTC, SAYS PANTERA CAPITAL CEO!!!!!
description:
Early Bitcoin investor crunched the numbers on BTC, and says it's looking mighty undervalued at the moment.

"We did a study showing the number of people using Bitcoin over the years and price of Bitcoin. Both of those data series went up by an order of magnitude every two years. If that kept going, that would put BTC at $700K when everybody with a smartphone uses it.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
